#summary aggregate2 - aggregates data which has been pre-sorted by key(s)

= Usage =
`aggregate2 <options> [file ...]`

= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||Arugment||Description||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-V||--version|| ||print version info and exit||
||-v||--verbose|| ||print verbose messages during execution||
||-d||--delim||<delim> ||field separator string||
||-p||--preserve-header|| ||do not treat first line as data||
||-k||--keys||<keys> ||list of aggregation keys||
||-s||--sums||<sums> ||list of fields to sum||
||-c||--counts||<counts> ||list of aggregation count||
||-o||--outfile||<outfile> ||file to which output should be written (default: stdout)||
----
